homes_hear_details: Hawaii has launched both the HOMES and HEAR programs through the Hawaii State Energy Office, providing rebates for whole-home energy efficiency retrofits and high-efficiency electric appliances. Hawaii received over $48 million in IRA funding for these programs.

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For a family of four in Honolulu County, 80% AMI is approximately $86,400. Outer islands have lower thresholds. Low-income households qualify for up to 100% of project costs covered under HOMES.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For a family of four in Honolulu County, 150% AMI is approximately $162,000. Moderate-income households qualify for up to 50% of project costs under HOMES.

net_metering: Hawaii transitioned from traditional net metering to Customer Grid-Supply (CGS) and Customer Self-Supply (CSS) programs. Under CGS, customers receive a credit for exported solar energy at a rate lower than the retail rate. CSS requires all solar generation to be used on-site. Smart Export programs offer time-of-use export credits.

state_tax_credits.name: Hawaii Renewable Energy Technologies Income Tax Credit
state_tax_credits.amount: 35% of installed cost for solar PV (capped at $5,000), 35% for solar thermal (capped at $2,250), and 20% for wind systems (capped at $1,500)
state_tax_credits.eligible_items: Solar photovoltaic systems, solar thermal systems, wind energy systems, and battery storage systems paired with renewable energy
state_tax_credits.details: This is a non-refundable state income tax credit that can be carried forward. The credit is claimed in the tax year the system is placed in service. It stacks with the federal 30% ITC.

state_rebate_programs.name: Hawaii Energy Efficiency Rebate Program
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Energy-efficient appliances, LED lighting, HVAC systems, heat pump water heaters, building envelope improvements
state_rebate_programs.details: Hawaii Energy is the state's ratepayer-funded conservation and efficiency program. Rebates are available for residential and commercial customers of HECO, MECO, and HELCO.

state_rebate_programs.name: Heat Pump Water Heater Rebate
state_rebate_programs.amount: Up to $1,000 for qualifying heat pump water heaters
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: ENERGY STAR certified heat pump water heaters replacing electric resistance or propane water heaters
state_rebate_programs.details: Additional bonuses may be available for income-qualified households. Must be installed by a licensed contractor.

programs.name: Customer Grid-Supply Program
programs.amount: Export credit rate varies by island (approximately $0.10-$0.15/kWh)
programs.eligible_items: Grid-connected solar PV and battery storage systems

programs.name: Battery Bonus Program
programs.amount: Up to $850/kW for residential battery storage
programs.eligible_items: Battery energy storage systems paired with solar PV

programs.name: Time-of-Use Rate Program
programs.amount: Lower rates during off-peak hours; higher rates during peak (5-9 PM)
programs.eligible_items: All residential customers with smart meters

programs.name: Customer Renewable Programs
programs.amount: Export credits vary by program tier
programs.eligible_items: Solar PV systems, battery storage, and solar-plus-storage systems

programs.name: Customer Renewable Programs
programs.amount: Export credits vary by program tier
programs.eligible_items: Solar PV systems, battery storage, and solar-plus-storage systems
